rpgonline.texture

Class FilterTileTexture

  • java.lang.Object
    • rpgonline.texture.BasicTileTexture
      • rpgonline.texture.FilterTileTexture
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TileTexture

    public class FilterTileTexture
extends BasicTileTexture
    A tile texture that is filtered through a color based upon the hex value of their game state.
    Author:
    Tomas

      • isCustom

        public boolean isCustom()
        Determines if the texture uses custom rendering.
        Returns:

      • render

        public void render(org.newdawn.slick.Graphics g,
                   long x,
                   long y,
                   long z,
                   World w,
                   java.lang.String state,
                   Tile t,
                   float sx,
                   float sy,
                   float wind)
        Renders the tile.
        Parameters:
        g - The graphics context to use.
        x - The X position of the tile.
        y - The Y position of the tile.
        z - The Z position of the tile.
        w - The world the tile is in.
        state - The state of the tile.
        t - The tile to render.
        sx - The X position of the tile on the screen.
        sy - The Y position of the tile on the screen.
        wind - The current wind value.
